author: Don
long_description:
# myeyes
Tells you what you are pointing at.

Simply point at something and it tells you in the bottom right hand side of the screen.

It tells both the name and the technical name.

It is very handy when mining. If you have a mod like [myores](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Don/myores/) then you will appreciate having this mod.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

name: myeyes
short_description: Tells you what you are looking at
title: My Eyes
